Html:
Hi,

when i try to delete an update i got this error message followed by an offer to display
the updates which referenced to this update.
When i try to display the referenced update the referenced-update-list is completely empty. So its not possible to delete any prerequisites .... so its not possible to delete this update.

My Version: 1.3.1411.09

Any idea?
moe

Once you have the empty list displayed, go to Help -> Send Debug Info -> "Show informations" and send me the debug file at package.publisher@free.fr

Thanks

Thx for your answer!
I just sended the informations.

regards moe

Hi,

is there a chance to delete these orphaned updates?

moe

Hi,

i tried the latest Version (Release v1.3.1504.15) but cannot delete theses orphaned Objects.
A little help would be nice ...

moe
